Translations.Text: wahuwa alladhi yatawaffakum bi-al-layli wayaʿlamu ma jarahtum bil-nahari thumma yabʿathukum fihi liyuq'da ajalun musamman thumma ilayhi marjiʿukum thumma yunabbi-ukum bima kuntum taʿmaluna
wahuwa l-qahiru fawqa ʿibadihi wayur'silu ʿalaykum hafazatan hatta idha jaa ahadakumu l-mawtu tawaffathu rusuluna wahum la yufarrituna
thumma ruddu ila l-lahi mawlahumu l-haqi ala lahu l-huk'mu wahuwa asraʿu l-hasibina
qul man yunajjikum min zulumati l-bari wal-bahri tadʿunahu tadarruʿan wakhuf'yatan la-in anjana min hadhihi lanakunanna mina l-shakirina
quli l-lahu yunajjikum min'ha wamin kulli karbin thumma antum tush'rikuna
qul huwa l-qadiru ʿala an yabʿatha ʿalaykum ʿadhaban min fawqikum aw min tahti arjulikum aw yalbisakum shiyaʿan wayudhiqa baʿdakum basa baʿdin unzur kayfa nusarrifu l-ayati laʿallahum yafqahuna
wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa l-haqu qul lastu ʿalaykum biwakilin
wa-idha ra-ayta alladhina yakhuduna fi ayatina fa-aʿrid ʿanhum hatta yakhudu fi hadithin ghayrihi wa-imma yunsiyannaka l-shaytanu fala taqʿud baʿda l-dhik'ra maʿa l-qawmi l-zalimina
